name: r/RocketLeague Declutter
description: r/RocketLeague recently underwent a redesign to look more like the game but went a little too far. The gradients have been simplified, as well as the titles to fix contrast issues and removal of the animations.
additional_info:
1.0.2
  • Restored "domain" identifiers on title links
  • Increased thumbnails to be uniform regardless of content
1.0.1
  • Added "Segoe UI" to the font stack for Windows
1.0 - Reworked the "New" style
  • Removed all gradients
  • Replace section titles with live text
  • Toned down the colors a little
  • Increased readability of links, including hover styles on title links
  • Slight increase to size of title links
  • Removed all animations (shiny reddit & ticker)
  • Cleaned up sidebar hovers
